attributes.action: ask that the Defence Honours Comm. consider awarding the Victoria Cross to Gary O'DonnelI,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lived and died as a hero, holder of the George Medal, I believe he should receive the VC for sustained courage over many campaigns. To honour his memory and to give some succour to his family, especially his baby. RIP.

rejection.details: You should have received an email providing a detailed explanation of the initial rejection. Pls refer to that response.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
